text: Ulrich "Uli" Sutor (born May 9, 1960) is a former German curler and curling coach. He is a former European men's curling champion (), German men's curling champion (1989) and two-time German mixed curling champion (1989, 1990, silver in 1988, bronze in 1987).Curling - Deutsche Meisterschaften ==Awards and honours== *Collie Campbell Memorial Award: 1986. ==Teams== ===Men's=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
